    Class representing the result of token validation.
    LogUtils
    LogUtils - A comprehensive logging utility library that enhances standard Java logging with structured logging, performance monitoring, routing, filtering, and more.
    LogUtils.ConsoleAppender
    Console log appender implementation
    LogUtils.JsonAppender
    JSON log appender for structured logging
    LogUtils.LogAppender
    Interface for log appenders/destinations
    LogUtils.LogEvent
    Log event representing a single log message with all metadata
    LogUtils.LogEventBuilder
    Builder for creating log events
    LogUtils.LogFilters
    Utility for creating common log filtering predicates
    LogUtils.Logger
    Logger class that handles log routing and event creation
    LogUtils.LogManager
    Log manager that handles appenders and log routing
    LogUtils.MDC
    MDC (Mapped Diagnostic Context) for adding thread-local context to logs
    LogUtils.MemoryAppender
    Memory log appender that keeps logs in memory for debugging
    LogUtils.PerformanceTracker
    Performance tracking utility for detailed timing metrics
    LogUtils.StructuredLogger
    Structured logging helper for building structured log messages
    NetworkUtils
    Utility class for network operations such as HTTP requests, IP address validation, port checking, and network diagnostics.
    StringUtils
    Utility class with string-related methods.
